attributes.action: Make Venues using Strobe lighting, having to put a display / sign indicating the usage of strobe lighting
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I wish to ask for any Venue like night club, Disco, Public House, Theatre etc. When they are using strobe lighting to have to a sign outside the venue, which is seen before payment is made. saying that Strobes are in use in this venue. so people with Epilespy know before entering that there is a danger to them.
